meanings.definition: The act of cooking food in an oven or over an open flame.
meanings.sent1: I love the smell of baking bread in the morning.
meanings.sent2: My mom is baking a delicious cake for my birthday.
meanings.sent3: The baking cookies in the oven made the whole house smell amazing.
meanings.sent4: The sun was so hot, it felt like it was baking the ground.
meanings.sent5: The baking of the pie crust turned it a beautiful golden brown.

meanings.definition: The process of making baked goods such as bread, cakes, and cookies.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's baking always tastes so good.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy baking cookies with my friends on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The baking of the cupcakes turned into a fun competition.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the warmth of baking fresh bread.
meanings.sent5: The secret to great baking is to measure ingredients carefully.

meanings.definition: The act of hardening by heat.
meanings.sent1: The baking of the clay pots made them strong and durable.
meanings.sent2: The baking of the sun dried up the wet sand quickly.
meanings.sent3: The baking of the cookies in the sun was an accidental experiment.
meanings.sent4: The intense heat was like the baking of bricks in a kiln.
meanings.sent5: The baking of the desert ground made it difficult to walk barefoot.
